original_text: And the Levites took down the ark of the Lord and the box that was beside it, in which were the golden figures, and set them upon the great stone. And the men of Beth-shemesh offered burnt offerings and sacrificed sacrifices on that day to the Lord.
korean_text: 레위인은 여호와의 궤와 그 궤와 함께 있는 금 보물 담긴 상자를 내려다가 큰 돌 위에 두매 그 날에 벧세메스 사람들이 여호와께 번제와 다른 제사를 드리니라

sentences.original_text: And the Levites took down the ark of the Lord
and the box that was beside it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 곁에 있던 상자를 내렸습니다

sentences.original_text: in which were the golden figures
and set them upon the great stone
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 큰 돌 위에 올려놓았습니다

sentences.original_text: And the men of Beth-shemesh offered burnt offerings
and sacrificed sacrifices on that day to the Lord
